articles.description: Up to date information on where to get the new PS5 console
articles.content:
What is happening to PS5 stock?
It is worth explaining why this is happening.
In September 2020 Sony already knew stock levels were not going to meet demand. They promised more pre-orders by Christ… [+573 chars]
